name: Molten Core
description: A raid deep within Blackrock Mountain, home of Ragnaros the Firelord.

bosses.name: Lucifron
bosses.mainMechanic: Fait exploser un joueur aléatoire (Living Bomb), éloignez-vous du raid.

spells.name: Impending Doom
spells.desc: A curse that deals periodic shadow damage.

spells.name: Lucifron's Curse
spells.desc: Increases the cost of abilities and spells by 100% for 5 minutes.

bosses.strategy: Assign decursers quickly to remove Lucifron’s Curse. Spread out to reduce shadow damage and focus down the two Flamewaker Protectors first.

bosses.name: Magmadar
bosses.mainMechanic: Fait exploser un joueur aléatoire (Living Bomb), éloignez-vous du raid.

spells.name: Lava Bomb
spells.desc: Creates a fire patch dealing fire damage over time.

bosses.strategy: Use Fear Ward or Tremor Totems to handle Panic. Keep the raid spread and move out of Lava Bomb patches. Hunters should maintain Tranquilizing Shot on cooldown.

bosses.name: Gehennas
bosses.mainMechanic: Fait exploser un joueur aléatoire (Living Bomb), éloignez-vous du raid.

spells.name: Rain of Fire
spells.desc: Deals fire damage in an area.

bosses.strategy: Tank Gehennas away from his adds. Kill the adds first, then the boss. Avoid Rain of Fire zones and dispel the healing reduction curse immediately.

bosses.name: Garr
bosses.mainMechanic: Fait exploser un joueur aléatoire (Living Bomb), éloignez-vous du raid.

spells.name: Antimagic Pulse
spells.desc: Dispels magic effects from nearby enemies.

bosses.strategy: Each add must be off-tanked and killed one by one. Assign warlocks to banish specific adds. Focus on control and avoid breaking banishes early.

bosses.name: Baron Geddon
bosses.mainMechanic: Fait exploser un joueur aléatoire (Living Bomb), éloignez-vous du raid.

spells.name: Living Bomb
spells.desc: Afflicts a random player who will explode after 8 seconds.

spells.name: Ignite Mana
spells.desc: Burns mana and deals fire damage over time.

bosses.strategy: Players with Living Bomb must move away from the raid. Use fire protection potions and avoid standing near mana users if Ignite Mana is active.

bosses.name: Shazzrah
bosses.mainMechanic: Fait exploser un joueur aléatoire (Living Bomb), éloignez-vous du raid.

spells.name: Arcane Explosion
spells.desc: Deals arcane damage to all nearby enemies.

spells.name: Gate of Shazzrah
spells.desc: Teleports to a random target and follows with Arcane Explosion.

bosses.strategy: Casters should stay spread. Melee must move out quickly after each teleport. Interrupt Arcane Explosion whenever possible.

bosses.name: Golemagg the Incinerator
bosses.mainMechanic: Fait exploser un joueur aléatoire (Living Bomb), éloignez-vous du raid.

spells.name: Magma Splash
spells.desc: Applies a stacking fire damage debuff to melee attackers.

bosses.strategy: Tank him in place and swap tanks to manage debuff stacks. Kill the Core Ragers last after Golemagg dies.

bosses.name: Sulfuron Harbinger
bosses.mainMechanic: Fait exploser un joueur aléatoire (Living Bomb), éloignez-vous du raid.

spells.name: Inspire
spells.desc: Buffs nearby allies, increasing their damage.

bosses.strategy: Each Flamewaker Priest should be tanked separately. Focus on killing healers first, then Sulfuron. Interrupt heals whenever possible.

bosses.name: Majordomo Executus
bosses.mainMechanic: Fait exploser un joueur aléatoire (Living Bomb), éloignez-vous du raid.

spells.name: Magic Reflection
spells.desc: Reflects spells for a short duration.

bosses.strategy: Manage adds carefully — kill healers first, then elites. Do not kill Executus himself; he yields after his guards are defeated.

bosses.name: Ragnaros
bosses.mainMechanic: Fait exploser un joueur aléatoire (Living Bomb), éloignez-vous du raid.

spells.name: Wrath of Ragnaros
spells.desc: Knocks back nearby enemies and deals fire damage.

spells.name: Sons of Flame
spells.desc: Summons fire elementals during submerge phase.

bosses.strategy: Stay max range to avoid knockbacks. Manage submerge phases by controlling and killing Sons of Flame quickly. Use fire resist gear.
